info.title: Bankuity API Service (3.2025.11.1401)
info.description:
Bankuity API

The Bankuity API provides comprehensive financial analysis capabilities through a RESTful interface. This API enables developers to access sophisticated income analysis, loan assessment, and financial risk evaluation services based on bank statement data.

Key Capabilities

Income Analysis

Advanced financial pattern detection that identifies and verifies income sources, evaluates stability, and provides detailed transaction insights. Our machine learning models ensure accurate categorization across multiple income streams.

Powered by ML-based transaction analysis

Risk Assessment

Comprehensive risk evaluation using advanced behavioral analytics and predictive modeling. Get deep insights into repayment probability and risk factors through our sophisticated ML algorithms.

Real-time risk scoring engine

Lending Intelligence

Data-driven lending recommendations that optimize loan amounts and terms based on thorough financial analysis. Get intelligent insights for structuring loans that balance risk and opportunity.

AI-powered decision support

Authentication

The API requires two authentication keys for all requests:

Key TypeHeader FormatDescription
Subscription KeyOcp-Apim-Subscription-Key: {YOUR_SUBSCRIPTION_KEY}Your organization's unique identifier, provided during onboarding
API KeyAuthorization: {YOUR_API_KEY}Access key for specific endpoints, provided by the Bankuity API team
Important: API keys are private and should never be shared or exposed in client-side code. Always store keys securely and use appropriate security measures when implementing the API.

Data Processing

The API processes financial data through several sophisticated steps:

  1. Transaction categorization and enrichment
  2. Income pattern recognition and source identification
  3. Risk factor analysis and scoring
  4. Lending recommendation generation
  5. Alert and insight derivation
Version Information: This documentation covers version 1 (v1) of the Bankuity API. All endpoints are prefixed with /v1 unless otherwise specified.

post.description:
The method returns the result corresponding to the requestCode.

The request code is checked in the database for the specified date, and if this information is not available, it is taken from the IBV provider and analyzed. If the date of an earlier snapshot is specified, then the difference between the two snapshots is analyzed.

Sample request:

POST v2/analysis/insights?requestCode=N4RHKX&ibvProviderName=Chirp&asOfDate=2025-01-16&postOnboardingRefDate=2024-12-10

parameters.name: asOfDate
parameters.description: Сurrent date for main analysis scenario

parameters.name: postOnboardingRefDate
parameters.description: The date against which the analysis result should be compared

post.description:
This method returns the following for the bank routing number and account number provided:

  1. AccountInfo: Valid/NotMatch/TokenizedMatch/ProviderError
  2. Bank name
  3. Bank account type (checking or savings)
  4. Account holder name(first name, last name)

Sample request:

POST v2/analysis/bankinfo/check?requestCode=N4RHKX

requestBody.description: Сurrent date for main analysis scenario

get.description:
The method returns the result corresponding to the requestCode.

The requestCode is checked with the IBV provider, and if the IBV provider has more recent data, a new snapshot is taken from the provider and analyzed. If no new data is detected, then analysis results stored in the DB will be returned.

Sample request:

GET v2/analysis/income?requestCode=N4RHKX

The method checks whether there is a connection between the selected request and the IBV provider.

Sample request:

GET v2/connections/status?requestId=41c7cb45-2cba-4287-9c6f-6ec1fbc37e77

post.description:
Connect to IBV provider and refresh data

This method connects to the IBV provider to refresh the client data and creates a new request, in which the new IBV data of the client will be stored. The operation is asynchronous and the new requestID can be used in the call to GetProcessingResults.

Attempting to refresh a request within 3 hours of a successful verification or refresh will not be permitted.

Sample request:

POST v2/connections/refresh?requestId=20f1d43f-7688-4dfa-9d3d-0effd3f86daa

get.description: This endpoint is used to verify the validity of authorization.

The method returns the result corresponding to the request ID received in the analysis/income/search method or other methods.

Sample request: GET v2/analysis/income/result?requestId=41c7cb45-2cba-4287-9c6f-6ec1fbc37e77

post.description:
This endpoint returns a list of request IDs for a specified period. Only users with the "Client" or "Agent" roles have the permission to access this endpoint.

Filter for GetRequestIds method

The filter has three templates for selecting records.
  • filterEl - filters by one field.
  • filterExp -filters by several fields.
  • filterBExp -filters by several filterExp.

Fields available for filtering:

“AppUserId”,”RequestId”,”Updated”,”Created”,”CustomerName”,”LastUpdated”,”RequestCode”,”SourceType”

You can use any types of filters individually or together.In case of sharing between filters AND operation is used.

This endpoint receives IBV data for a customer and return IBV data processing results.

Request body contains Json object containing Chirp reports corresponding to their name. If the report is not used, it can be omitted. the requiestID returned in the report can be used to rerequest same report using GetProcessingResults endpoint ``` { "RequestStatus": {}, - The getRequestStatus endpoint response. "TrackInfo": {}, - The getRequestTrackInfo endpoint response. "RequestDetails": {}, - The getRequestDetails endpoint response. "AccountOwnerInfo": {}, - The getAccountOwnerInfo endpoint response. "AccountInfo": {} - The getAccountInfo endpoint response. } ```

The method returns the transactions corresponding to the request ID received in the /TransDetails/GetProcessingResults method.

Sample request: POST api/GetTransactions

The method returns the transactions corresponding to the RequestCode received in the /TransDetails/GetProcessingResults method.

Sample request: POST api/GetTransactionsForRequestCode?requestCode=OPX1YU
This endpoint is used to request a temporary JWT (JSON Web Token) that can be used to authenticate subsequent requests to other API methods.

get.description: This method takes IBV data for CustomerUUID from LMS system and return Analysis results.

parameters.name: templateid
parameters.description: Template to be used to post comment back to LMS system

isPrimary.description: Indicates if this is the primary account.

activeMonthlyIncome.description: Total active monthly income from income sources.

riskScore.description: Numeric representation of the risk score.

account_number.description: Account number associated with the account.

apr.description: Annual Percentage Rate (APR) applied to the account.

apy.description: Annual Percentage Yield (APY) associated with the account.

created_at.description: Date and time when the account was created.

credit_limit.description: Credit limit associated with the account.

currency_code.description: Currency code used for the account.

guid.description: Globally unique identifier (GUID) for the account.

holdings_value.description: Total value of holdings in the account.

interest_rate.description: Interest rate applied to the account.

institution_code.description: Institution code associated with the account.

is_closed.description: Indicates whether the account is closed.

type.description: Type of the account (e.g., savings, checking).

subtype.description: Subtype of the account (e.g., premium, standard).

updated_at.description: Date and time when the account was last updated.

user_guid.description: User GUID associated with the account.

premium_amount.description: Premium amount associated with the account.

routing_number.description: Routing number linked to the account.

imported_at.description: Date and time when the account was imported.

account_number.description: Account number associated with the bank account.

routing_number.description: Routing number used for identifying the financial institution.

transit_number.description: Transit number associated with the bank account.

institution_number.description: Institution number of the financial institution.

passed_validation.description: Indicates whether the account has passed validation checks.

owner_name.description: Full name of the account owner.

address.description: Street address of the account owner.

city.description: City of the account owner's address.

state.description: State or province of the account owner's address.

postal_code.description: Postal or ZIP code of the account owner's address.

country.description: Country of the account owner's address.

email.description: Email address of the account owner.

phone.description: Phone number of the account owner.

first_name.description: First name of the account owner.

last_name.description: Last name of the account owner.

amount.description: The monetary value of the expense.

category.description: The category under which the expense is classified.

percent.description: The percentage representation of the expense in relation to a total amount.

expressions.description: List of filters for multiple fields with the same AND or OR operation

FilterBigExpression.description: Filter for multiple fields with the different AND or OR operation

elements.description: List of filters for single field

FilterExpression.description: Filter for multiple fields with the same AND or OR operation

requestId.description: The unique identifier for the request.

errors.description: A list of errors encountered during processing.

pageNumber.description: Page number to return. Start from 1. Default is 1.

pageSize.description: Number of requests on one page. Default is 100.

orderByDescending.description: Sort in descending order. Default is false.

token.description: The token to be used in all subsequent calls, will expire in 60 minutes.

availableProducts.description: The list of products available for the authorized customer.

redirectLink.description: After login on which page user should be redirected

pageSize.description: Number of requests on one page. Default is 100.

pageNumber.description: Page number to return. Start from 1. Default is 1.

pageSize.description: Number of requests on one page. Default is 100.

totalAmount.description: Total Amount of the transactions. Default is 0;

requestId.description: The unique identifier for the request.

updated.description: The date and time when the object was last updated, formatted in the default time zone.

snapshotDate.description: The snapshot date and time, formatted in the default time zone.

unitName.description: The name of the unit associated with the request.

refreshedBy.description: The name of the person who refreshed the request.

status.description: The string representation of the request's status.

ibvStatus.description: The current status of the IBV (e.g., active, inactive, pending).

requestCodeStatus.description: The status associated with the request code, indicating the outcome or current state.

subscribedOn.description: The date and time when the subscription was first created or activated.

refreshedOn.description: The date and time when the subscription was last refreshed or updated.

unsubscribedOn.description: The date and time when the subscription was unsubscribed or deactivated.

lastRequestId.description: The unique identifier for the last request made, used for tracking and reference.

historicalBalances.description: The collection of historical balance items for the account.

daysWithNegativeBalance.description: Number of days with negative balance.

inflowExcludingLoans.description: Inflow excluding loans for the account.

activePayrollIncomeSources.description: Number of active payroll income sources.

activeBenefitIncomeSources.description: Number of active benefit income sources.

totalCredits.description: Sum of credit transaction amount of each account

totalDebits.description: Sum of debit transactions amount of each account

netCashFlow.description:
• If the transactions happened over more than 30 days:
    • Calculates an average monthly cash flow based on the total money coming in (credits) and going out (debits) during that time.
  • If the transactions happened within 30 days or less:
    • Calculates the net cash flow by subtracting the total money spent (debits) from the total money received (credits).

spending.description:
• If the spending happened over more than 30 days:
    • Calculates an average monthly spending based on the total amount spent (debits) over that time.
  • If the spending happened within 30 days or less:
    • Calculates the total amount spent without averaging it over a month.

balance.description: Balance at the end of the day

highestMonthlyIncomeDate.description: Date of highest recorded monthly income.

lowestMonthlyIncomeDate.description: Date of lowest recorded monthly income.

type.description:
Type of an item.
  • Salary Wage
  • Retirement Benefits
  • SelfFreelance - NDD Income
  • SelfFreelance - GIG Income
  • Transfers
  • Others
  • Loans

totalIncomeDelta.description: Change in total income over time.

latestCredit.description: Date or amount of the latest credit transaction.

cashFlowDelta.description: Change in cash flow over time.

type.description:
Type of an item.
  • Salary Wage
  • Retirement Benefits
  • SelfFreelance - NDD Income
  • SelfFreelance - GIG Income
  • Transfers
  • Others
  • Loans

activeScore.description: The active score associated with the user or payment.

depositMethod.description: The method used for depositing payments.

pastDeposits.description: The list of past deposits made.

missingPayDay.description: The list of missing payday records.

numOfPay.description: The total number of pay periods.

numOfPayMonthly.description: The number of pay periods in a month.

recurringScore.description: Recurring score for the income source.

sourceChannel.description: The source channel for the payment.

sourceType.description: The type of source for the payment.

stabilityScore.description: Stability score for the income source.

stableMonthlyIncome.description: Stable monthly income from this source.

isDominant.description: A flag indicating whether the payment method is dominant.

transactionsCount.description: The total number of transactions made.

debitType.description: Type of debit associated with the loan.

amount.description: Amount of money involved in the transaction.

description.description: Description providing additional details about the transaction.

numMonthsIncomeHistory.description: Number of months in income history.

amountPaidInLoans.description: Total amount that has been paid.

numLoans.description: Number of loans associated with the account.

cashflow.description: The cash flow value associated with the account.

start.description: The start date of the transaction range.

end.description: The end date of the transaction range.

assessmentReasonsCustomer.description: List of assessment reasons for the account.

assessmentReasonsCustomerGood.description: List of reasons why the rating is good for the account.

assessmentReasonsCustomerBad.description: List of reasons why an account has a bad rating.

customerIncomeType.description:
Customer income type:
  • Payroll
  • Benefit
  • Deposit
  • Transfer
  • Irregular(Customer income is steady but is not deposited in the account in regular intervals. E.g.: gig income)
  • None(No active income was detected within the bank account)

debitDate.description: Recommended day to debit the account.

maxDebitAmount.description: Suggested maximum debit amount towards a payment per month.

minDebitAmount.description: Suggested minimum debit amount towards a payment per month.

nextPaymentOnHoliday.description: Is there a payday on a holiday weekend?

paymentNearHoliday.description:
Predicted payroll deposit day upon a holiday weekend:
  • Before (B) before the holiday weekend
  • After (A) the holiday weekend
  • None (No Value) if not applicable

repeatOpportunity.description:
This measure estimates the likelihood that the customer will return for repeat business:
  • High – High likelihood
  • Medium – Medium Likelihood
  • Low – Low likelihood

lastUpdated.description: The date and time when the data was last updated.

requestCode.description: Unique request code for identifying the request.

asOfDate.description: The date representing the 'as of' reference point.

snapshotDate.description: The date representing the snapshot reference point.

id.description: Unique identifier of the transaction in the database.

day.description: The day of the week for the transaction.

incomeType.description: Type of income for the transaction.

depositType.description: Type of deposit for the transaction.

transactionType.description: Type of the transaction (e.g., credit, debit).

ibvCategory.description: Category of the transaction in IBV.

status.description: The current status of the product (e.g., active, inactive, etc.).

statusDescription.description: A description of the product's status, if applicable.

message.description: A message providing additional information about the product or its processing.

errors.description: Contains a list of products that are unavailable due to the end of the subscription.

customerName.description: Name of the customer associated with the request.

entityName.description: Name of the entity associated with the request.

profileName.description: Profile name of the customer or entity.

accessInfo.description: Additional access information related to the request.

bankName.description: Name of the bank associated with the request.

planType.description: Type of plan selected for the request.

subscriptionStatus.description: Current subscription status for the request.

addedOn.description: Timestamp indicating when the request was added.

attemptedOn.description: Timestamp indicating when the request was attempted.

verifiedOn.description: Timestamp indicating when the request was verified.

rejectedOn.description: Timestamp indicating when the request was rejected.

unsubscribedOn.description: Timestamp indicating when the request was unsubscribed.

status.description: Request status. ( Created = 0, Processing = 1, Completed = 2, Error = 3 )

requestCode.description: Request code from the IBV provider.

lastViewed.description: Date of last request for data.

RefreshStatus.description: Status indicating if the request needs to be refreshed.

FirstName.description: First name associated with the request.

LastName.description: Last name associated with the request.

Environment.description: Environment in which the request was processed (e.g., Production, Sandbox).

Mode.description: Operational mode of the request (e.g., Live, Test).

SelectedBank.description: Name of the selected bank associated with the request.

isAccountConnected.description: Indicates whether the account is successfully connected.

isLinkExpired.description: Indicates whether the connection link has expired.

LastAggregatedAt.description: Timestamp of the last aggregation activity.

connectionStatus.description: Current connection status of the account.

statusDetails.description: Detailed information about the current status.

category.description: The identifier for the transaction category.

total.description: The total number of transactions in the category.

amount.description: The total monetary amount associated with the category.

recentTransactionAmount.description: The amount of the most recent transaction in the category.

recentTransactionCount.description: The count of recent transactions in the category.

categoryName.description: The display name of the transaction category.

created_at.description: Date and time when the transaction was created (optional).

account_guid.description: Unique identifier for the account related to the transaction.

parentCategoryCode.description: Parent category code of the transaction.

account_id.description: Unique identifier for the account associated with the transaction.

id.description: Unique identifier for the transaction summary.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user associated with the transaction (optional).
